title: iOS no longer requires App Tracking for notifications
body: Starting with the new v2.12.3 for iOS, App Tracking is no longer required for notifications. No fundamental code has been changed, we simply worked with Apple to prove we are not tracking users. Once updated iOS users can safely remove App Tracking or uninstall/reinstall the app to clear out permissions.

title: Tautulli Remote for iOS is out of beta!
body: Tautulli Remote has officially launched on iOS. Thank you to all the iOS beta testers. Tap here to view in the App Store.

title: Tautulli Remote supports community powered translations
body: Since v2.10.0 Tautulli Remote has supported multiple languages. See a missing translation or error? Want to help translate to a new language? Tap here to help out!

title: Update your Tautulli Notification Agent
body: If you are switching over from the previous Tautulli Remote you may be experiancing generic notification messages that are missing details. Tap here to learn how to fix this in Tautulli.
